gobblin.util.limiter

Interface Limiter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountBasedLimiter, NonRefillableLimiter, PoolBasedLimiter, RateBasedLimiter, TimeBasedLimiter

    public interface Limiter
    An interface for classes that implement some logic limiting on the occurrences of some events, e.g., data record extraction using an Extractor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Closeable acquirePermits(long permits)
      Acquire a given number of permits.
      void start()
      Start the Limiter.
      void stop()
      Stop the Limiter.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Start the Limiter. See stop()

      • acquirePermits

        Closeable acquirePermits(long permits)
                  throws InterruptedException
        Acquire a given number of permits.

        Depending on the implementation, the caller of this method may be blocked. It is also up to the caller to decide how to deal with the return value.

        Parameters:
        permits - number of permits to get
        Returns:
        a Closeable instance if the requested permits have been successfully acquired, or null if otherwise; in the former case, calling Closeable.close() on the returned Closeable instance will release the acquired permits.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the caller is interrupted while being blocked

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the Limiter. See start()
